titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a special allocation under the new markets tax credit in connection with trade adjustment assistance.
New Employment for Workers & Job Opportunities for Business Strength Act of 2007
New Employment for Workers & Job Opportunities for Business Strength Act of 2007
NEW JOBS Act of 2007

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: New Employment for Workers & Job Opportunities for Business Strength Act of 2007 or the NEW JOBS Act of 2007 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase by $500 million in 2008 the new markets tax credit limitation amount that is allocable among qualified community development entities for investments in or loans to businesses that hire trade adjustment assistance (TAA) recipients or that meet other TAA requirements.
